name: Hold It Down Now [United Game Jam 2020]
name_original: Hold It Down Now [United Game Jam 2020]
description:
Submission for UGJ 2020

*REQUIRES TWO CONTROLLERS TO PLAY

**Make sure both controllers are connected before playing. I recommend the Xbox controllers.

Hold down the right trigger button and release it when it has enough power. Try to knock your opponent out of the ring with one hit. You can't hit unless you have enough power.

Look at your arm height to see how much power you have. The higher the arm the closer it is to full power.Controls:

  • Left Stick - Move
  • RIght Stick - Turn
  • Right Trigger - Hold down and release at full power to hit
